https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hxUQ7LFb32GdJjyHipUap6NZfVX.jpg One evening, a married young singer Zoha meets the French lawyer Mathieu in a night club in Beirut. Mathieu will become suspected of spying, while Zoha is trying to flee from her husband. Despite these problems, the two will witness a love story for few days mixed with violence and fear. Beirut Hotel
